title: Money Heist
description: A mastermind gathers eight criminals to carry out an ambitious heist on the Royal Mint of Spain.

title: The Boys
description: In a world where superheroes abuse their powers, a group of vigilantes take them down by any means necessary.

title: Ozark
description: A financial planner drags his family into the dark world of money laundering for a drug cartel.

title: Loki
description: After stealing the Tesseract, Loki lands in trouble with the Time Variance Authority and explores multiverse chaos.

title: Chernobyl
description: A gripping retelling of the 1986 Chernobyl nuclear disaster and the brave people who tried to contain it.

title: Better Call Saul
description: A small-time lawyer slowly transforms into the morally questionable Saul Goodman from Breaking Bad.

title: The Crown
description: A historical drama chronicling the reign of Queen Elizabeth II and the events that shaped the 20th century.

title: Narcos
description: The rise and fall of drug kingpin Pablo Escobar and the Medellín Cartel.
